title: Newhouse vs Helvetica
content:
Hello,

I’ve just discovered [Newhouse](http://web.archive.org/web/20080112153506/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dtptypes/newhouse-dt/), I must admit I can hardly spot any difference with helvetica.

uhm, I mean, nothing but the price.

Expert thoughts ?

 [‹ (x) Formaggio's font Pizzeria & Restaurant logo - Fontleroy Brown {Rainer}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080112153506/http:/typophile.com/node/38451 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) The Harsh Light of Science faceted tech sans - Vectrex {Simon H, Angel} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080112153506/http:/typophile.com/node/38429 "Go to next forum topic")
author: john good

comments.content: color seems a lot more evenly distributed than most of the helvs i’ve seen. strokes seem more evenly proportioned too.
Looks like a shameless Helvetica rip-off to me.
